item.description: Upgrading # If BurmillaOS has released a new version and you want to learn how to upgrade your OS, we make it easy using the ros os command. Since BurmillaOS is a kernel and initrd, the upgrade process is downloading a new kernel and initrd, and updating the boot loader to point to it. The old kernel and initrd are not removed. If there is a problem with your upgrade, you can select the old kernel from the Syslinux bootloader.
